name: Envelope Follower
description: This algorithm is a simple envelope follower. It outputs a CV according to the volume envelope of the input audio. When operating on stereo (or multichannel) signals, it tracks the maximum of the various signals and outputs a single CV. If you want to separately track the left and right sides of a stereo signal, use this algorithm configured as two mono channels.
short_description: Tracks the volume envelope of a signal
use_cases: Left/right channel separation in stereo processing
Modulation source for other effects or synths

input_ports.name: Audio Input
input_ports.description: The audio signal to track the volume envelope from.

output_ports.name: CV Output
output_ports.description: The CV signal generated according to the input audio's volume envelope. For stereo/multichannel inputs in max mode, a single CV output is provided based on the maximum envelope across channels.

output_ports.name: Audio Output (if enabled)
output_ports.description: The processed audio signal routed back to the specified bus when 'Output' is set to 'None'.
